scripts.install: npm run install_backend && npm run install_frontend
scripts.build: npm run install && npm run build_frontend
scripts.start: cd backend && set NODE_ENV=production&& node app.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start_dev_b: npm run install_backend && cd backend && npm run start
scripts.start_dev_f: npm run install_frontend && cd frontend && npm run serve
